summary: Completed comprehensive testing of L'Éclaireur application - Quebec workers' compensation document analysis tool. All backend APIs functional, frontend UI features working correctly including legal popup, dark mode, navigation arrows, and footer links.
passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with L'Éclaireur title
Ko-fi small icon visible under author credit
Anti-hate mention visible: '(La haine et la violence ne seront jamais acceptées)'
Navigation arrows (3 buttons) functional on right side
Dark mode toggle works both ways
Legal popup displays when clicking 'Commencer l'analyse'
Checkbox 1 (comprendre) mandatory - accept button disabled without it
Accept button enables after mandatory checkbox checked
Footer links present: CNESST, TAT, Aide juridique, SOQUIJ, Collège des médecins
Physicians section with CMQ disciplinary decisions link
Analysis page accessible with upload zone
